name: Food.Quest
description:
This is a little Twine game I made for Uni. It features a couple of the characters I draw on a regular basis. Mostly text, but with some pixel art gifs as well. For those unfamiliar to Twine, it's like a little choose your own adventure.

I like to think my writing is charming, novel and funny- but then, I wrote it, so feedback is always welcome~
